name: SPOMENIK-1
description:
Spomenik literally means monument. Any general standing geometry of significance, powerful structures. Dead physical geometry with symbolic meaning, despite fractured social historical context. Can you make meanings from this powerful poor standing monument, eerily structured?

"...short and to the point... with enough depth to drive it higher than your usual walking simulator" - Pip Turner

This short vignette game presents an isolated island where a strange monument sits. Who built this? What does it mean?

You are strongly encouraged to read the artist's statement linked below after playing the game.
